{"id":1081005499,"question_id":3166,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1697943364,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1081005499/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Groups to Create a Valid Assignment","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minGroupsForValidAssignment(int[] nums) {\n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map =new HashMap<>();\n        for(int n : nums){\n            map.put(n, map.getOrDefault(n,0)+1);\n        }\n        \n        int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        for(int k : map.keySet()){\n            min = Math.min(min, map.get(k));\n        }\n        \n        \n        int g=0;\n        for(int k : map.keySet()){\n            int cnt = map.get(k);\n            if(cnt<=min+1){\n                g++;\n                continue;\n            }else{\n                \n                g+=cnt/(min+1);\n                \n                if(cnt%(min+1)!=0)\n                    g++;\n                \n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        return g;\n        \n    } \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-groups-to-create-a-valid-assignment","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
